invalid-api-key: API key cannot be empty or less than "{minLenghth}" characters long
invalid-port: Invalid port number "{port}". Must be between 1 and 65535
invalid-redis-db: Invalid Redis DB index "{dbIndex}". Must be between 0 and 15
invalid-email-recipient: At least one email is required
invalid-template-base: Must be a instance of TemplateBase
invalid-tfa-code: Invalid TFA code "{code}". Must be a 6-digit number
